delete_account.heading: Account Deletion
delete_account.intro: Your Brave Creators account and information will be permanently deleted from our database. This action cannot be undone.

prompt.final_confirmation: It'll take a few minutes for the purge to complete.
prompt.header: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
prompt.warning: Your Brave Creators account and information will be permanently deleted from our database. This action cannot be undone.

delete_account.warning: Your channels and all accounts related information will be permanently deleted from our database as well as from connected providers. This cannot be undone.

email.heading: Email Settings
email.marketing_label: Updates on new features and promotions

extended_login.intro: Keep my login active for 30 days

index.heading: Two-factor Authentication
index.intro: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is a method of confirming your identity by using two different forms of verification when you access Brave Payments in order to increase security (recommended for protecting your account).

confirm_disable.final_confirmation: Are you sure you want to disable authenticator app?
confirm_disable.no_2fa_warning_html: Disabling authenticator app will effectively turn off the two-factor authentication for your account.
confirm_disable.no_totp_warning: Authenticator app provides a good fallback method to log in to your account securely in the case that you lose the hardware security key.

totp.disabled: Authenticator app has not been set up
totp.disabled_without_fallback_html: Recommended: Set up an authenticator as the secondary 2FA in case you run into a problem with the security key.
totp.enabled: Authenticator app has been set up
totp.heading: App on your phone
totp.intro: Use an app on your phone to get an authentication code. You will be asked to type in this code when logging in.

browser.content_html: This means you will need to update to the latest Brave, Google Chrome or Opera in order to set up and log in using security keys. More browsers will start supporting the security key in the near future. We will inform you on the changes.
browser.heading: Limited Browser Support

device.content_html:
The following products have been tested and proven to work with our system:
- YubiKey
- Ledger Blue
device.heading: Tested Security Keys
device.tooltip: A list of security keys that have been tested

u2f.heading: Hardware security keys
u2f.intro: Security key is a small device that connects to your computer via a USB port and works with FIDO Universal 2nd Factor (U2F). You will be asked to insert and press the key instead of typing in a code.
u2f.intro_warning: Currently, security key is supported by Brave, Google Chrome, and Opera.

prompt.heading: Protect your account
prompt.intro: This added security is recommended for making sure it's really you logging in to your account.

new.heading: Set Up Authenticator App
new.step_1: Install an authenticator app on your mobile phone.
new.step_2: Scan the QR code below with your app.
new.step_2_alt: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this code:
new.step_3: Enter the 6-digit code from the app once the scan is complete.
new.warning: Reconfiguring will invalidate your existing authentication code devices.

new.heading: Register Security Key
new.name_placeholder: Enter a nickname for the key

u2f-error.bad-request:
There was an unexpected error in the registration request made by
Brave. Please reload this page and re-attempt registration.
(BAD_REQUEST)
u2f-error.device-ineligible:
The presented security key is not eligible for registration. This may mean
that the token is already registered. (DEVICE_INELIGIBLE)
u2f-error.implementation-incomplete:
Please insert your security key and re-attempt registration. Some
browsers have an incomplete implementation of this
protocol. Please use a current release of Brave, Google Chrome or Opera.
(IMPLEMENTATION_INCOMPLETE)
u2f-error.other-error:
There was an unexpected error registering your security key. Re-attempting
registration may resolve this issue. (OTHER_ERROR)
u2f-error.timeout:
There was an unexpected timeout waiting for your security key to respond to
the registration request. Please re-attempt registration and activate
the security key when it is blinking. (TIMEOUT)

new.u2f-unavailable:
Your browser doesn't look like it supports U2F, the two factor auth
platform supported by Brave. Please use the latest version of Brave, Chrome
or Opera to register your U2F-compatible device, for example a YubiKey.
new.waiting_description:
Insert the new hardware key into your computer and press the button when
it's blinking.

confirm_disable.final_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this security key?
confirm_disable.no_2fa_warning_html:
Removing this security key will effectively
turn off the two-factor authentication
for your account.
